title: Gab and Juls: Who Would Write Off Erling Haaland?
description:
Gab Marcotti and Julien Laurens are back to discuss Liverpool’s 3-1 victory over Manchester City and ask why people are lining up to write off Erling Haaland so early. The guys also discuss England’s historic success in the Women’s EUROs, Brazil’s victory in the women’s Copa America and question whether Cristiano Ronaldo will be a Manchester United player for much longer.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN
itunes:subtitle: Evaluating Erling Haaland's performance vs Liverpool; England's historic EUROs win; Ronaldo saga at Man United keeps intensifying
